_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

One who practices to benefit themselves, but not others
One who practices to benefit others, but not themselves
One who practices to benefit neither themselves nor others
One who practices to benefit both themselves and others
How a person practices to benefit themse: Quick-witted when it comes to skillful teachings
Readily memorize the teachings they’ve heard
Examine the meaning of teachings they’ve memorized
How a person practices to benefit others: Not quick-witted when it comes to skillful teachings
How a person practices to benefit neithe: Not quick-witted when it comes to skillful teachings
Not practicing to benefit themselves or others
How a person practices to benefit both t: Quick-witted when it comes to skillful teachings
Practicing to benefit themselves and others
